questions.question: She was red ……………………….. embarrassment.
questions.description: With is used in a number of expressions which show how people are showing their emotions and sensations.

questions.question: The travelers were shivering ……………………. cold.
questions.description: With is used in a number of expressions which show how people are showing their emotions and sensations.

questions.question: You should reach there ………………………. 5 o’clock.
questions.description: By can mean not later than.

questions.question: ……………………… the end of the party, everybody was tired.
He succeeded ……………………… hard work.
questions.description: We use by to talk about what we do to get a certain result. We use with to talk about what we use to get a result.

questions.question: Our roof was damaged ………………………. the storm.
I was interrogated ……………………….. the police inspector.
questions.description: In passive voice, by is used to introduce the agent.

questions.question: He earned just enough to get ……………………….
questions.description: To get by is to survive with great difficulty.

questions.question: Please be patient …………………….. the children.
questions.description: With is used after several adjectives which show how people are feeling towards others.

questions.question: She has always been nice …………………….. me.
questions.description: With is not used with words like kind, polite, nice, rude etc.

questions.question: There are so many people ……………………….. no homes.
